intro.title: Hi, i'm Melani!
intro.description: Full stack developer. My goal is to overcome my limits and face any obstacle that arises in my path. I am passionate about learning new technologies and I am always ready to take on new challenges.

about.title: About me
about.description-one: My interest in this field arose in 2023, the year in which I decided to take a big step that led me to discover the passion that technology generates in me.
about.description-two: I define myself as a disciplined and persevering person. My constant curiosity drives me to overcome challenges with enthusiasm and commitment. I enjoy working in teams, where I can contribute my dedication and skills to achieve shared goals. I have experience working with JavaScript, React Js, Redux Js, Node Js, Express, PostgreSQL, and HTML.
about.description-three: I am excited to continue growing and contributing to the fascinating world of technology. Every day is an opportunity to learn something new and face new challenges, and I am committed to making the most of every experience that comes my way.

projects.name: La Ola Urbana
projects.description: The site offers everything needed for surf enthusiasts: from boards to accessories. With an integrated payment gateway, email notifications, an easy-to-use shopping cart, and a comprehensive administration panel.

projects.name: Pokémons
projects.description: I worked as a full-stack developer on a project about Pokémon. The platform offers detailed information about different types of Pokémon, with options for searching, filtering, sorting, creating Pokémon, and pagination.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you want to contact me, you can do so through social media or by filling out the contact form. I will respond to you as soon as possible. Thank you!
contact.name: Name
